name: Basic TPS in three.js
description:
Used : three.js vs cannon.js implementation intro visual js.

I will publish new revision of visual js with nice three.js high level class.
This demo is commercial prototype but in new revision you will get class for easy use (mod MIT).

Done : camera - fixed , shooting , enter player name , collect diamonds.
New step : networking , super fast loading .
